actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act for the purpose of imposing certain conditions with respect to mortgages insured under title II of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to set forth the percentage of the total charges, including points and service on carrying charges, which a mortgagee must pay to the Federal Government upon foreclosure of a government - insured mortgage loan. Restricts the power of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter mortgage insurance contracts where the mortgagee has already foreclosed upon a specified number of mortgages insured under such Act. Prescribes conditions which must be met before a mortgagee may utilize property which secures a government-insured mortgage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act for the purpose of imposing certain conditions with respect to mortgages insured under title II of such Act.
